pages.text: There are several ranks on WesterosCraft we use to designate responsibilities

$(li)$(l)guest$()$(br) Everyone starts out as a guest when they first join the server. You can only explore - no building allowed! $(br)$(li)$(l)new builder$()$(br) Once you've successfully completed the application process, you can start building!$(br)$(li)$(l)builder$()$(br)Full builder status is granted after you've been a new-builder for a certain amount of time

$(li)$(l)editor$()$(br)Trusted builders can get editor status, that lets you use WorldEdit$(br)$(li)$(l)terraformer$()$(br)Basically the same as editors, but dedicated to helping others and terraforming large swaths of land$(br)$(li)$(l)moderator$()$(br)Moderators manage applications, projects, community disputes and other tasks
$(li)$(l)admin$()$(br)Runs and manages the server, community and code
